title: Investing In The Cannabis Market
itunes:title: Investing In The Cannabis Market
description:
Alex Pasternack, Executive Vice President of Binske, discusses investing in the cannabis industry. Katie Thomas, Lead of the Kearney Consumer Institute, talks retail earnings. Brian Smoluch, Principal, Portfolio Manager at Hood River Capital Management, discusses the markets. Sean Lyons, CEO of R/GA, talks about the hybrid workplace. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
